amendment.description: Amendment ensures that the States' securities regulators have the authority to police fraud, deceit, misrepresentation, and other unlawful behavior in order to protect investors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 112-265 to preserve a state's right to enforce securities laws with respect to fraud, deceit or unlawful conduct.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perlmutter amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
